name: Defender (itch) (hedersonleeh)
description:
Defender Instructions

 Fight against the enemies, build towers and traps and get help from foreign reigns.

  Don't let the evil forces destroy the kingdom!!!

  • Move : WASD or ArrowKeys
  • Z key/Button A: Attack /Interact
  • C key/Button B: Go back / Exit
The destiny of the kingdom is in your hands…

 Join defender in this tower defense game and protect the kingdom of the evil forces of Reignar. Don't let them destroy your kingdom!!

The action behind the curtains 

 Hi! I'm Hedersonleeh and I'm the developer of this game, it is such a pleasure that you took the time to play it and help defender on this mission.  You can find me on social media as @hederson_leeh.

 This game was design and written by my talented girlfriend Lara Cristina Pérez Molina, you can find her on social media as @LaraCristinaPM.

 This game was born in my little cousin mind, so I would like to thanks him, Asiel Bermúdez, future game developer.
